branchCategory.name: NC(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Single Acting Single Rod
branchCategory.description: Standard single acting, single rod version of the NCQ2 compact cylinder. The NCQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 50mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.
